author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Updated design with new elements from requirements doc, which is:
* The ability to query the last modification time of a config.
* The ability to validate the configuration.
- Simplified the INI and Array diagrams.
- Created diagram for the validation classes.
- Wrote missing API documentation and improved the existing one.
- Changed class names which were wrong according to naming standard.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added forward slash (/) as an allowed character for group names.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Made it clearer how the whitespace trimming works, ie. it does it on the
comment block and not on each line.
